45 void PioneerPacket::command(const Init_t &command)
46 {
47  this->clear();
48  this->setHeader();
49  this->setSize(3);
50  this->setCommand(static_cast<unsigned char>(command));
51  this->setChecksum();
52 }
53 
54 void PioneerPacket::command(const Void_t &command)
55 {
56  this->clear();
57  this->setHeader();
58  this->setSize(3);
59  this->setCommand(static_cast<unsigned char>(command));
60  this->setChecksum();
61 }
62 
63 void PioneerPacket::command(const Int_t &command, int value)
64 {
65  this->clear();
66  this->setHeader();
67  this->setSize(6);
68  this->setCommand(static_cast<unsigned char>(command));
69  Types_t type = (value >= 0) ? ARGINT : ARGNINT;
70  this->setType(type);
71  this->setArgument(value);
72  this->setChecksum();
73 }
74 
75 void PioneerPacket::command(const TwoBytes_t &command,
76  unsigned char first_byte,
77  unsigned char second_byte)
78 {
79  this->clear();
80  this->setHeader();
81  this->setSize(6);
82  this->setCommand(static_cast<unsigned char>(command));
83  this->setType(ARGINT);
84  this->setArgument(first_byte,second_byte);
85  this->setChecksum();
86 }
87 
88 void PioneerPacket::command(const TwoBytes_t &command,
89  const std::vector<bool> first_byte,
90  const std::vector<bool> second_byte)
91 {
92  if (first_byte.size() > 8)
93  ROS_ERROR("The first byte must be at most 8 bit, size was %lu", first_byte.size());
94  if (second_byte.size() > 8)
95  ROS_ERROR("The second byte must be at most 8 bit, size was %lu", second_byte.size());
96  this->clear();
97  this->setHeader();
98  this->setSize(6);
99  this->setCommand(static_cast<unsigned char>(command));
100  this->setType(ARGINT);
101  unsigned char a = 0u, b = 0u;
102  for (size_t i = 0; i < first_byte.size(); ++i) {
103  setBit(first_byte[i], i, a);
104  }
105  for (size_t i = 0; i < second_byte.size(); ++i) {
106  setBit(second_byte[i], i, b);
107  }
108  this->setArgument(a,b);
109  this->setChecksum();
110 }
111 
112 void PioneerPacket::command(const Str_t &command,
113  const std::string &msg)
114 {
115  assert(msg.size() < 200);
116  this->clear();
117  this->setHeader();
118  this->setSize(msg.size()+5);
119  this->setCommand(static_cast<unsigned char>(command));
120  this->setType(ARGSTR);
121  this->setArgument(msg);
122  this->setChecksum();
123 }
124 
125 void PioneerPacket::clear()
126 {
127  memset(buffer_, 0, sizeof(buffer_));
128 }
129 
130 bool PioneerPacket::send(int file_descriptor)
131 {
132  size_t buffer_size = buffer_[2] + 3; // Send the entire buffer,
133  // Including the header
134  size_t written_bytes = write(file_descriptor, buffer_, buffer_size);
135  if (written_bytes != buffer_size)
136  {
137  ROS_ERROR("Could not send the entire buffer");
138  return false;
139  }
140  return true;
141 }
142 
143 bool PioneerPacket::receive(int file_descriptor)
144 {
145  unsigned char current_char = 0, previous_char = 0;
146  bool header_flag = false;
147 
148  this->clear();
149 
150  while (!header_flag && ros::ok())
151  {
152  if ( (read(file_descriptor, &current_char, 1) < 0) )
153  {
154  ROS_ERROR("Error while trying to read serial port");
155  return false;
156  }
157  if (previous_char == 0xFA && current_char == 0xFB)
158  {
159  header_flag = true;
160  }
161  previous_char = current_char;
162  }
163  this->setHeader();
164  read(file_descriptor, &current_char, 1);
165  this->setSize(current_char);
166  if ( (read(file_descriptor, &buffer_[3], buffer_[2]) < buffer_[2]) )
167  {
168  ROS_ERROR("Error while trying to read the packet body");
169  return false;
170  }
171  if (!this->check())
172  {
173  ROS_ERROR("Packet failed to pass checksum");
174  return false;
175  }
176  return true;
177 }
178 
179 unsigned char PioneerPacket::operator [](int i) const
180 {
181  if (i < 0 || i > 206)
182  ROS_ERROR("Packet out of bounds, requested %i", i);
183  else
184  return buffer_[i];
185 }
186 
187 unsigned char PioneerPacket::at(int i) const
188 {
189  if (i < 0 || i > buffer_[2] - 2)
190  ROS_ERROR("Packet out of bounds, requested %i and size was %i", i, buffer_[2]-2);
191  else
192  return buffer_[i+2];
193 }
194 
195 int PioneerPacket::getIntegerAt(int i, int &output) const
196 {
197  /* 15 ls-bits and 1 bit sign */
198  if (i < 0 || i > buffer_[2] - 2)
199  ROS_ERROR("Packet out of bounds, requested %i and size was %i", i, buffer_[2]-2);
200  else
201  {
202  unsigned int number = buffer_[i+2] | buffer_[i+3] << 8;
203  output = number & ~(1u << 15);
204  if (getBit(buffer_[i+3],7) == 1)
205  output = - output;
206  return (i+2);
207  }
208 }
209 
210 int PioneerPacket::getUnsignedAt(int i, int &output) const
211 {
212  /* 16 ls-bits */
213  if (i < 0 || i > buffer_[2] - 2)
214  ROS_ERROR("Packet out of bounds, requested %i and size was %i", i, buffer_[2]-2);
215  else
216  {
217  output = buffer_[i+2] | buffer_[i+3] << 8;
218  return (i+2);
219  }
220 }
221 
222 int PioneerPacket::getStringAt(int i, std::string &output) const
223 {
224  if (i < 0 || i > buffer_[2] - 2)
225  ROS_ERROR("Packet out of bounds, requested %i and size was %i", i, buffer_[2]-2);
226  else
227  {
228  output.clear();
229  while (buffer_[i+2] != '\0' && i < buffer_[2] - 1)
230  {
231  output.append(reinterpret_cast<const char*>(&buffer_[i+2]),
232  reinterpret_cast<const char*>(&buffer_[i+3]));
233  i++;
234  }
235  return (i+1);
236  }
237 }
238 
239 int PioneerPacket::getStringAt(int i, int length, std::string &output) const
240 {
241  if (i < 0 || i > buffer_[2] - 2 || length > buffer_[2] - 2)
242  ROS_ERROR("Packet out of bounds, requested %i, length was %i, size was %i,", i, length, buffer_[2]-2);
243  else
244  {
245  output.clear();
246  output.append(reinterpret_cast<const char*>(&buffer_[i+2]),
247  reinterpret_cast<const char*>(&buffer_[i+length+2]));
248  return (i+length+1);
249  }
250 }
251 
252 int PioneerPacket::getBoolVectorAt(int i, std::vector<bool> &output) const
253 {
254  if (i < 0 || i > buffer_[2] - 2)
255  ROS_ERROR("Packet out of bounds, requested %i and size was %i", i, buffer_[2]-2);
256  else
257  {
258  output.clear();
259  for (int j = 0; j < 8; j++) {
260  output.push_back(getBit(buffer_[i+2], j));
261  }
262  return (i+1);
263  }
264 }
265 
266 bool PioneerPacket::check()
267 {
268  int checksum = this->calculateChecksum();
269  size_t buffer_size = buffer_[2] - 2;
270  if ( (checksum == buffer_[buffer_size-2] << 8) | buffer_[buffer_size-1])
271  return true;
272  return false;
273 }
274 
275 int PioneerPacket::calculateChecksum()
276 {
277  int checksum = 0;
278  size_t bytes_left = buffer_[2] - 2;
279  size_t current_byte = 3;
280  while (bytes_left > 1)
281  {
282  checksum += (buffer_[current_byte]<<8) | buffer_[current_byte+1];
283  checksum = checksum & 0xFFFF;
284  bytes_left -= 2;
285  current_byte += 2;
286  }
287  if (current_byte > 0)
288  checksum = checksum ^ buffer_[current_byte];
289 
290  ROS_DEBUG("Checksum is %i", checksum);
291  return (checksum);
292 }
293 
294 void PioneerPacket::printHex()
295 {
296  size_t buffer_size = buffer_[2] + 3; // Print the entire buffer,
297  // Including the header
298  ROS_INFO("HEX");
299  for (size_t i = 0; i < buffer_size; ++i)
300  {
301  ROS_INFO("0x%.2x ", buffer_[i]);
302  }
303 }
304 
305 void PioneerPacket::printDec()
306 {
307  size_t buffer_size = buffer_[2] + 3; // Print the entire buffer,
308  // Including the header
309  ROS_INFO("DEC");
310  for (size_t i = 0; i < buffer_size; ++i)
311  {
312  ROS_INFO("%u ", buffer_[i]);
313  }
314 }
315 
316 void PioneerPacket::printASCII()
317 {
318  size_t buffer_size = buffer_[2] + 3; // Print the entire buffer,
319  // Including the header
320  ROS_INFO("ASCII");
321  for (size_t i = 0; i < buffer_size; ++i)
322  {
323  ROS_INFO("%c ", static_cast<unsigned char>(buffer_[i]));
324  }
325 }
326 
327 void PioneerPacket::setHeader()
328 {
329  buffer_[0] = 0xFA;
330  buffer_[1] = 0xFB;
331 }
332 
333 void PioneerPacket::setSize(unsigned char size)
334 {
335  buffer_[2] = size;
336 }
337 
338 void PioneerPacket::setCommand(unsigned char command)
339 {
340  buffer_[3] = command;
341 }
342 
343 void PioneerPacket::setType(const Types_t &type)
344 {
345  buffer_[4] = static_cast<unsigned char>(type);
346 }
347 
348 void PioneerPacket::setArgument(int value)
349 {
350  unsigned short argument = static_cast<unsigned short>(std::abs(value));
351  buffer_[5] = argument & 0xFF;
352  buffer_[6] = (argument >> 8) & 0xFF;
353 }
354 
355 void PioneerPacket::setArgument(unsigned char first_byte,
356  unsigned char second_byte)
357 {
358  buffer_[5] = first_byte;
359  buffer_[6] = second_byte;
360 }
361 
362 void PioneerPacket::setArgument(const std::string &argument)
363 {
364  buffer_[5] = argument.size();
365  for (size_t i = 0; i < argument.size(); ++i)
366  {
367  buffer_[i+6] = static_cast<unsigned char>(argument.at(i));
368  }
369 }
370 
371 void PioneerPacket::setChecksum()
372 {
373  size_t buffer_size = buffer_[2];
374  int checksum = this->calculateChecksum();
375  buffer_[buffer_size+1] = checksum >> 8;
376  buffer_[buffer_size+2] = checksum & 0xFF;
377 }
378 
379 bool PioneerPacket::getBit(unsigned char byte, int position) const
380 {
381  return (byte >> position) & 0x01;
382 }
383 
384 void PioneerPacket::setBit(bool bit, int position, unsigned char &output) const
385 {
386  output |= (bit << position);
387 }
